Title: Fast Sofa

Actors: Jake Busey, Crispin Glover, Natasha Lyonne, Adam Goldberg
Plot: This road picture follows a dope fiend named Rick, who believes his goal in life is to track down Ginger, a famous porn star who is currently staying in her Beverly Hills hideaway. Rick is ...
